title: Shiguang Guiyu: Juchang Ban
synopsis: On his wedding day, Shi Xiaoguang could only helplessly watch as a mysterious power took his bride, Xiaqing, away. Afterwards, he found that no one remembers the existence of this person “Xiaqing” and he is hunted by this unclear force. Faced with this situation, Shi Xiaoguang slowly finally understood that the world as he knew it as changed.
background: although i said there are two seasons this one seems to be a movie version according to a rough translation while sohu lists that there will be 10 of them i'm not sure what to say >.
